1.1.name: wordpress/gs-gomobi-redirector
1.1.description:
goMobi is a popular mobile website solution for businesses of all sizes. Many businesses also use Wordpress as the CMS solution for their full-size website.

The "official" goMobi Wordpress plugin utilises a Javascript redirect mechanism which is not an optimal solution for the PHP-based Wordpress platform. This plugin wraps the "official" goMobi PHP-based redirect code and delivers a server-side redirect solution for your Wordpress/goMobi integration.
